attributes.action: Enforce landlords and Housing Assocations to provide Greener and more energy saving heating systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister agrees that the UK should become more energy saving and use more "Greener" means to reduce wasted energy.

Many Housing Associations and landlords still refuse to install combination energy saving heating and more effective water heating systems despite been old and energy wastefull.

We Petition the government to enforce energy saving heating systems to be installed when requested by tenants to save energy and become Greener.
